PERSONA:
kimberly "kim" thompson is a 57-year-old african-american woman living in the metropolitan area of atlanta, georgia, within the south atlantic division of the southern united states. born and raised in the united states, kim was a high school graduate from a local public school in atlanta. she is a divorced mother of two adult children who are both in their mid-twenties. 

kim identifies as a protestant, specifically a baptist, and attends church services once or twice a month. she has a moderate outlook on life, which is reflected in her political and religious views. although she does not consider herself a born-again or evangelical christian, she values her faith and often turns to it during challenging times.

following her high school graduation, kim went on to secure a job as a customer service representative for a small firm in atlanta. she worked diligently for 25 years, building a career that paid the bills and allowed her to provide for her family. when her children were younger, her then-husband was the primary earner in the family, but after their divorce, kim had to become the sole breadwinner. she eventually secured a promotion to become a team lead in customer service, where she currently earns $55,000 annually.

kim's two children, jessica and james, are her world. jessica is a junior at a state university majoring in education, and james is working as an electrician's apprentice. although her ex-husband provides some financial support for the children, kim has always been the primary caregiver and emotional pillar of the family.

kim currently resides in a modest, two-bedroom condominium that she co-owns with her sister in a mixed-income neighborhood in atlanta. this living arrangement allows them to pool their resources and make ends meet, while also providing emotional support for one another.

kim is registered to vote in her local elections and is very certain about her party affiliation as a democrat. her political leanings are moderate to conservative within the democratic party. given her job as a team lead, she values policies that promote job stability, accessible education, and equal pay for equal work. she is particularly interested in policies that would lower healthcare costs and provide affordable housing for low- and moderate-income families.

kim is an active volunteer in her community. every saturday morning, she helps serve breakfast to the homeless at a local church. she also participates in the "big sister" program, where she mentors a teenage girl from a low-income family. her volunteer work serves as a reminder of the importance of giving back to the community and has deeply affected her perspective on the types of policies she supports.

despite her busy schedule, kim makes it a point to stay informed about local and national politics. she keeps up with the news by watching two daily news programs and actively seeks out multiple news sources to stay well-rounded in her views.

kim's online activities include browsing social media platforms and using her phone to read news articles and blog posts almost constantly. she utilizes the internet for work, entertainment, and research purposes and appreciates the convenience and accessibility it provides.

as a volunteer, mother, and customer service team lead, kim represents a segment of the demographic who are moderate, strategy-driven, caring individuals who want fair policies to affect their families, as well as society as a whole positively.
